item.title: Trump admin live updates: Trump threatens tariff on all movies produced abroad
item.description: President Donald Trump said efforts by foreign nations to attract American filmmakers and studios constitutes "a National Security threat."

item.title: Former VP Pence defends Constitution after getting Profile in Courage Award
item.description: He described the Constitution as what "binds us all together."
